title: The USA will strengthen F-16 aircraft fighting in Ukraine
description: The American agency Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) has published a message in which she informed about the consent of the State Department for the sale of supplies for F-16 aircraft.

title: Mon will buy drones from the USA.Skyguardian for the Polish Army

title: The Polish town 97% destroyed in WWII which then rose from the ashes
description: Filip Mazurczak No Polish town - and probably none anywhere in Europe - suffered more destruction than Jasło.

title: Poland to make private TV stations “strategic firms”, allowing blocking of sale to “hostile” states
description: A businessman linked to Viktor Orbán - an ally of Poland's opposition - is reportedly seeking to buy TVN.

title: Polish state energy giant Orlen halts petrochemical plant project launched under former government
description: Billions have already been spent on the planned plant but Orlen says halting the project now will save the firm from likely losses.

title: How will Donald Trump’s election victory affect Polish politics?
description: Aleks Szczerbiak The US president-elect's victory is unlikely to be a political game-changer.

title: Poland climbs 22 places in fertility treatment ranking after change in government
description: State funding for IVF was restored by the new, more liberal ruling coalition after it came to power at the end of last year.
